attributes.background: Support the public and stop the energy increases.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You might also like to be aware of the Government's announcement on 9th September

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-energy-price-guarantee-for-families-and-businesses-while-urgently-taking-action-to-reform-broken-energy-market

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
